# Problem Statement

In this notebook we will explore how to do Automatic Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on the Tabular Playground Series January 2022 using [pandas profiling](https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling).

We are going to cover the following steps:
1. Import Libraries
2. Load Dataset
3. Print Report
4. References

Let's get started.

# Import Libraries
